name: AmazeVR Concerts
description:
Enter the gateway to the next stage of music where you come face to face with your favorite artists as they create an entirely new musical experience.

Imagine being in the front row at an exclusive VIP concert, but with the added thrill of traveling to a stunning new world inspired by the music and artists you love. Every beat and lyric is amplified in stunning virtual reality. Our ever-expanding selection of concerts allows you to connect with artists in ways you’ve never imagined.

Featured Launch Artist: Zara Larsson
Step into Zara Larsson’s world with a mesmerizing VR concert experience and lose yourself in the energy of her biggest hits as she performs a one-of-a-kind immersive show that cannot be missed.

All artists have one free song available. For those who can’t get enough, passes to the full versions of the VR concerts are available for purchase.

Download AmazeVR Concerts today and immerse yourself in an unforgettable experience. With more concerts always on the horizon, you won’t want to miss out.
